name: Amazing Christmas
description:
This is a festive, pixely/blocky a-mazing game, it gives off Minecraft vibes. The game's music gives it its Christmas vibes in my opinion.

This is my first game as an individual project of mine, I ran out of time because I underestimated the amount of time games can take to build.

This project was meant to be uploaded to the 'Big Festive Game Jam 2022'  hosted by liamsorta

The limitations were:

🎨 Artwork You may use any Kenney assets in your game, see a full list of his public domain assets found here: https://www.kenney.nl/assets

🔠 You may use public fonts (big recommendation for DaFont)

🎵 Audio You may use royalty-free samples + sound effects. Sources must be provided.

🏃‍♀️ Animations You may use any 3D animations (+models) offered by Adobe's Mixamo

⚙ Engine Stuff You can use any tools/editor extensions that do not directly add content to the game. e.g: Yarn, Bolt, Odin

I got the music from opengameart.org
